I was called in to exorcize a spirit from Frank's wife again! Rich people are so eccentric!

As always she was fine, just sick of Frank's shit.

But now I have a full paid vacation in this transport ship that I would never be able to afford on my own! It belongs to the Oddjobers if I'm not mistaken.

We were invited to listen to something called the hum, which is an auditory phenomenon that can be heard from on the deck of the ship.

It was beautiful..

I met Johnny Mythrilhand. Typical superstar. He was a bit of a jerk.

The droid tried to take Sassafraz but we stopped it. Johnny mumbled something about being targeted. I don't know, I think he needs to drink less. 

There was another person there named Chimer that seemed to get through to the robot. Johnny asked why we should go with it and it pulled out a gun in response!! Is everyone crazy?! I have to get out of here..
